init.message: You've reached Forest of the Damned, an SMS-based game! Text BEGIN to this number to start a new game. Text CMDS for a list of all commands. (Note: Commands are case-sensitive.)

intro.message: Welcome to Forest of the Damned! Throughout the game, you will see actions surrounded with [brackets]. Text us that phrase without the brackets to perform the action. (Case does not matter.) Type [ok] to continue.

secret.message:
We only surrounded the word 'brackets' in brackets to connect the characters to their name. Nonetheless, your usage is correct according to the rule we just taught you. We respect your outside-the-box thinking, so consider this an Easter Egg!

Text anything to continue.

story_intro.message: You are a prisoner that has been ordered by the fascist state to hunt down crystals essential for their empire. The guards pushed you out of the truck ordering you to mine or be executed. The dark forest is known as a no-man's land, as prisoners ordered to mine have never returned.

1, 1.message: Walking through the forest, you find pawprints that were a bit strange. At first, you thought the guards released the hounds however the prints are much larger than any hound or other animal. Observing the surrounding area, nothing can be found. Should you head [east] or [south]?

1, 2 - special.message: You stumble upon a glowing purple crystal embedded within a stone. This is one of the stones that the state is searching for, and you should [mine] it.

2, 1 - special.message: You stumble upon a glowing purple crystal embedded within a stone. This is one of the stones that the state is searching for, and you should [mine] it.

first_crystal - south.message: You have mined and found the first crystal. Though something seems off. The forest seems unusually quiet and the crows that produced the only sound apart from your footsteps seem to die down. You believe that you should [return] with what you have? Would you? Should you [continue]?

first_crystal - east.message: You have mined and found the first crystal. Though something seems off. The forest seems unusually quiet and the crows that produced the only sound apart from your footsteps seem to die down. You believe that you should [return] with what you have? Would you? Should you [continue]?

end.message: This is just a test; that is all for now. Text BEGIN to start a new game.

landmine.message: You have been walking for hours, and slowly have wandered away from the forest. The walk seems endless, and your feet are slowly growing tired.
